CAREER SUMMARY  
 
May 2022 to date CEQUENS FZE Dubai  
Position: Head of People & Culture  
 
Geographical Remit :  Egypt, UAE, KSA, Pak istan 
Reporting to :  CEO  
Headcount:   c 200  
Industry:   IT / Digital  
 
Respon sibilities : 
• Develop and devise the HR strategy and agenda  
• Tracker and evaluate the function’s performance  
• Develop policies, procedures, and training material for HR  
• Oversee all HR initiatives, systems, and tactics  
• Report metrics and data to the Senior Management  
• Serve as the point of contact for employment relations and communicate with 
employees.  
• Supervise the delivery of the HR team and provide guidance  
• Delivering holistic HR support within the various functions at CEQUENS 
including the technical and corporate functions by leading activities including 
but not limited to performance management, reward, and recognition, retention, 
learning and development, and resource planning  
• Create and sustain the setting up of the HR function with a team of HRBPs to 
provide support across the various locations  
• Ensure and monitor adherence to internal pol icies and legal requirements  
• Resolve grievances and violations invoking disciplinary action as required.  
    
• Anticipate and resolve litigation risks.  
 
Dec 2021 to May  2022 AL Fuuaim P rivate LLC  
Position: HR Business Partner – Aftersales (Automotive Division)  
 
Geographical Remit :  UAE 
Reporting to :  Senior HRBP  
Headcount:   c 400 of 15 00 total  
Industry:   Automotive  
 
Responsibilities  
• Act as a partner and as a trusted advisor to the senior business leaders and 
management  
• Provide professional and proactive HR holistic support for the business to 
formulate and implement HR strategies in response to  business priorities  
• Align people strate gy to business objectives  
• Advocate for employees to enable growth and success  
• Support the yearly budgeting process to determine headcount requirements 
with senior management and finance  
• Map talent, critical roles, and succession planning in collabora tion with senior 
business stakeholders  
• Progress and sustain the finance transformation agenda  
• Create and devise various retention plans and approaches  
• Support the implementation of the Group Emiratization strategy through 
promoting recruitment, devel opment, and retention  
• Lead and support Employee relations cases including disciplinary hearings  
• Act as a mediator to resolve conflicts between associates during informal 
stages where possible, including general complaints,  grievances, or 
disciplinary m atters  
• Ensure diversity aim is met  
• Implement and align the Group HR strategies and cyclical agenda  
• Implement and align to processes such as internal mobility, succession 
planning, talent reviews  
• Produce and maintain talent management information an d analytics  
• Map talent, critical roles, and succession planning in collaboration with senior 
business stakeholders  
• Support the performance management process from objective setting, 
midyear, yearend review, and calibration of talent across  the company  
• Assist Line Managers in initiating Performance Improvement Plans, coach 
Managers to conduct reviews, and raise separation  requests when required  
• Produce analysis and dashboards of headcount, manpower, cost, and attrition 
including trends and preparing executive summaries  for Senior Leaders  
• Support and participate in the hiring process  
 
Nov 2019 to Dec 2021 Al Futtaim Pr ivate LLS  
Position: HR Business Partner – Group Services  
 
Geographical Remit :  UAE, GC

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
